t: An Emergency Ordinance Amending Ordinance No. 081, Series 2019 Related to the Fiscal Year 2019-2020 Operating Budget by Appropriating $2,700,000 of Committed Fund Balance as Authorized in Ordinance No. 187, Series 2019, Section Iv to the Office of Resilience & Community Services to Establish an Emergency Assistance Fund to Provide Community Assistance Related to the COVID-19 Pandemic (as Amended).
